taskDescription: The 1H NMR spectrum shown is that of a compound isomeric with the one in Problem 19-80. This isomer has an IR absorption at 1730 cm–1. Propose a structure. [Note: Aldehyde protons (CHO) often show low coupling constants to adjacent hydrogens, so the splitting of aldehyde signals is not always apparent.]
